#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long int n,s,a,k,arr[50],i,c;
    c = 0;
    while(true)
    {
        cin >> n;
        if(n==0)
            break;
        else
        {
            c++;
            s = 0;
            i = 0;
            while(i<n)
            {
                cin >> arr[i];
                s+=arr[i];
                i++;
            }
            a = s/n;
            sort(arr,arr+n);
            i = 0;
            k = 0;
            while(i<n)
            {
                if(arr[i]>=a)
                   k+=(arr[i]-a);
                i++;
            }
            cout<<"Set #"<<c<<endl;
            cout<<"The minimum number of moves is "<<k<<"."<<endl;
            cout<<endl;
        }
    }
}
